articles.author: Manjiri Joshi
articles.title: ‘India Wants Normal Bilateral Ties With Pakistan, But…’: PM Modi Ahead of G-7 Summit in Japan - News18
articles.description: "...It is incumbent upon them to create a conducive environment free from terrorism and hostilities. The onus is on Pakistan to take necessary steps in this regard," said PM Modi, in an interview to Nikkei Asia
articles.content: Ahead of the G-7 Summit in Japan, Prime Minister Narendra Modi, in an interview to Nikkei Asia, said that India wants normal bilateral ties with Pakistan, adding that it is incumbent upon them to cre… [+3083 chars]
